title: Forward Contract Price
notes: This equation prices forward contracts under the cost-of-carry model

title: Forward Rate Agreement
notes: This equation calculates FRA settlement amounts

title: Interest Rate Swap Fixed Rate
notes: This equation calculates the fixed rate in an interest rate swap

title: Credit Default Swap Spread
notes: This equation approximates CDS spreads under constant hazard rate

title: CDS Valuation
equation: V_{\text{CDS}} = (1 - R) \times \sum_{i=1}^{n} Q_{i-1} (1 - Q_{i}) \times Z_{i} - s \times \sum_{i=1}^{n} Q_{i} \times Z_{i} \times d_{i}

title: Total Return Swap Value
notes: This equation values total return swaps

title: Lookback Option Price
equation: C_{\text{lookback}} = S_{0} N(d_{1}) - K e^{-rT} N(d_{2}) + \text{volatility adjustment}
notes: This equation prices lookback options that depend on the maximum or minimum price achieved

title: Quanto Option Price
equation: C_{\text{quanto}} = S_{0}^{f} N(d_{1}) - K e^{-r^{d} T} N(d_{2}) \times \frac{\sigma_{f}}{\sigma_{d}}
notes: This equation prices quanto options that convert currency risk

title: Compound Option Price
equation: C_{\text{compound}} = S_{0} N(d_{1}^{1}) e^{-r T_{1}} N(d_{2}^{1}) - K_{1} e^{-r T_{1}} N(d_{2}^{1}) + \text{inner option adjustment}
notes: This equation prices options on options

title: Chooser Option Price
notes: This equation prices chooser options that allow selection between call and put at a future date

title: Basket Option Price
equation: C_{\text{basket}} = e^{-rT} E_{Q} [\max(w_{1} S_{1} + w_{2} S_{2} + \dots + w_{n} S_{n} - K

title: Digital Option Price
notes: This equation prices binary options that pay a fixed amount if a condition is met

title: Exchange Option Price
notes: This equation prices options to exchange one asset for another

title: Spread Option Price
notes: This equation prices spread options on the difference between two assets

title: Forward Start Option Price
notes: This equation prices forward start options that begin at a future date
